segments.text: I see the woman, blissfully unaware of the disaster brewing behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to flow, but her focus is solely on drying that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost funny how engrossed she is, like a character in a play.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are engaged in this sneaky escapade, stealing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but chuckle at their innocent audacity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But what if they slip? What if the boy falls?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire scene feels like a ticking time bomb of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
